name: Oracle of Light
description: Fateweavers who use their powers to guide others toward positive destinies and protect the world from calamity, weaving threads of hope and salvation into the tapestry of fate.

resource_systems.name: Mana
resource_systems.description: Mystical energy that powers divination spells and prophecies
resource_systems.regeneration: 3 per 6 seconds, +5 when successfully predicting an event
mechanics: Mana points are spent to cast divination spells and invoke prophecies
Some abilities require maintaining a connection to the future, consuming mana over time
Meditation increases mana regeneration rate by 500% but prevents movement
Can channel mana into healing and protective prophecies

resource_systems.name: Fate Points
resource_systems.description: Accumulated knowledge of possible futures that can be spent to alter destiny
resource_systems.regeneration: 3 per long rest, additional points gained through significant divinations
mechanics: Fate Points can be spent to reroll dice for self or allies
Can be used to force a critical success or failure on a single action
Powerful destiny-altering abilities consume multiple Fate Points
Can be invested in long-term prophecies of salvation and protection

resource_systems.name: Destiny Threads
resource_systems.description: Tangible manifestations of fate that can be manipulated to create powerful effects
resource_systems.regeneration: 2 per hour, additional threads gained when significant events align with predictions
mechanics: Threads can be woven into patterns that create various magical effects
Can be attached to individuals to influence their destiny toward positive outcomes
More complex patterns require more threads but produce more powerful effects
Threads can be sacrificed to immediately alter the outcome of a critical event

resource_systems.name: Divine Radiance
resource_systems.description: Sacred light that illuminates the path of destiny and reveals the truth
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when guiding others toward positive outcomes or preventing calamities
mechanics: Increases by 10 when successfully guiding someone toward a positive destiny
Increases by 20 when preventing a prophesied calamity
Decreases by 5 per hour when not actively helping others
Can be spent to enhance healing abilities or create powerful protective effects

class_mechanics.name: Guiding Light
class_mechanics.description: The ability to illuminate the optimal path for others to follow
effects: Can reveal the best possible future path to allies
Allies under your guidance gain 30% increased experience and success chance
Can dispel uncertainty and fear with the clarity of perfect foresight
Presence automatically reveals hidden dangers and traps within 50 meters

class_mechanics.name: Prophecy of Hope
class_mechanics.description: Declarations of positive futures that inspire and empower
effects: Prophecies of success grant powerful buffs to allies
Can declare area-wide prophecies that boost entire communities
Prophecies of healing restore health and remove negative status effects
Inspired allies under your prophecies gain immunity to fear and despair

class_mechanics.name: Salvation Weaving
class_mechanics.description: Manipulation of fate to save lives and prevent disasters
effects: Can rewrite imminent death into survival for allies
Able to divert natural disasters away from populated areas
Can weave protective fate patterns that absorb damage
Presence reduces the severity of negative events within 100 meters

class_mechanics.name: Truth Revelation
class_mechanics.description: The power to reveal absolute truth and dispel deception
effects: Can reveal the true nature of any being or object
Automatically dispels illusions and deceptions within 30 meters
Grants allies the ability to see through lies and manipulation
Presence prevents scrying and fate manipulation by evil entities

signature_abilities.name: Destiny Sanctuary
signature_abilities.description: Create a sacred space where positive destinies are protected and negative fates cannot enter
mechanics: Establishes a 50-meter radius sanctuary that lasts for 10 minutes
Allies within the sanctuary cannot be targeted by harmful fate manipulation
All allies within gain 50% increased healing and 30% damage reduction
Enemies attempting to enter must succeed on a Wisdom save or be repelled
Costs 50 Mana, 3 Fate Points, and 30 Divine Radiance

signature_abilities.name: Prophecy of Salvation
signature_abilities.description: Declare a powerful prophecy that guarantees survival and victory for your allies
mechanics: Target up to 10 allies within 100 meters
For the next 5 minutes, targeted allies cannot be reduced below 1 health
When the effect ends, allies are healed for 50% of their maximum health
All targeted allies gain a 50% damage boost against prophesied enemies
Costs 70 Mana, 5 Fate Points, and 50 Divine Radiance

signature_abilities.name: Divine Intervention
signature_abilities.description: Directly intervene in the flow of fate to prevent a catastrophic event
mechanics: Can completely negate any single event, attack, or spell
Can resurrect a recently deceased ally with full health
Can completely heal all allies within 100 meters
When used to prevent a prophesied disaster, affects an entire region
Costs 100 Mana, 7 Fate Points, and 100 Divine Radiance

skill_trees.name: Path of the Guardian
key_abilities: Fate Shield: Create an impenetrable barrier of destiny that absorbs all damage
Calamity Diversion: Redirect a disaster away from its intended target
Destiny Ward: Place a permanent protective mark on a location or individual

skill_trees.name: Path of the Healer
key_abilities: Rewrite Wounds: Alter a target's fate to remove all injuries
Destiny Renewal: Restore youth and vitality to aging individuals
Purification Light: Cleanse corruption and disease from an area

skill_trees.name: Path of the Guide
key_abilities: Perfect Path: Reveal the exact steps needed to achieve a positive outcome
Inspiration Weave: Grant temporary divine inspiration for creative or intellectual tasks
Destiny Beacon: Create a guiding light that leads lost souls to safety

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 15 points in the Grand Prophet skill tree
advancement_requirements.alignment: Must maintain Good alignment for at least 10 levels
challenges: Guide a lost soul to their true destiny

legendary_items.name: Crown of Divine Foresight
effects: Wisdom increased by 5
Divine Radiance regeneration increased by 100%
Can see the optimal future path for any individual at will

legendary_items.name: Mantle of the Savior
effects: Prophecy of Salvation cooldown reduced by 6 hours
Automatically redirects 30% of damage from nearby allies to you
Creates a healing aura that restores 5% health per minute to all allies

legendary_items.name: Staff of Destiny's Light
effects: Increases the range of all abilities by 50%
Divine Intervention cooldown reduced by 1 day
Can store up to 3 prepared prophecies for instant activation

lore: Oracles of Light represent the most benevolent path a Fateweaver can take, dedicating their tremendous power over destiny to the protection and guidance of others. They perceive the tapestry of fate not as a tool for personal gain, but as a sacred responsibility to shepherd the world toward its brightest possible future. These luminous seers use their visions to prevent disasters, heal the wounded, and guide the lost toward their true purpose. Their prophecies inspire hope rather than fear, and their manipulations of fate always aim to maximize happiness and minimize suffering. Oracles of Light often establish sanctuaries where those in need can seek guidance, or they may travel the world in search of those whose destinies require intervention. Though they possess the power to dramatically alter the course of history, they use this ability with great restraint, understanding that even well-intentioned interference can have unforeseen consequences. They are revered throughout the world as beacons of hope in dark times, their mere presence often enough to turn the tide against despair.
